card.name: Combat Process Summary
card.text: 1. Determine the attack’s prowess 2. The hazard player may affect the attack (not individual strikes)/company. 3. The resource player may affect the attack/company. If the attack is still proceeding: 4. Assign strikes 5. Each defender faces a strike sequence. 6. Results. Steps 1 and 2 are ignored for Company vs Company Combat, and both players may engage in step 3.

card.name: Movement Process Summary
card.text: 1. Reveal the site. 2. Check legality. 3. Check for effects that return to site of origin, resource player may attempt to cancel/overcome these. 4. Under-Deeps roll. If still moving: 5. Apply effects of the new site. 6. Draw up to the amount of cards indicated. 7. Establish the base hazard limit. 8. Hazard Play/Resource Play 10. Initiate effects that would enable a company to move again; if this happens, return to step one. 11. Resolve hand size.

card.name: Strike Sequence Summary
card.text: 1. The hazard player may affect the strike/character. 2. The resource player may affect the strike/character. If the strike is still proceeding: 3. Determine character’s prowess; roll 4. Results In Company vs Company combat, ignore step one, and both players may engage in step two.

card.name: Strider
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Aragorn II. You may play Aragorn II at Strider’s current site during the organization phase; transfer all cards Strider controls to Aragorn II and discard Strider. Action: During the site phase, tap Strider to search your play deck for a non-Greater Item resource that can be played at his current site and place it in your hand. The play deck is reshuffled and Strider makes a corruption check.

card.name: Azog
card.text: Unique. Balrog specific. Leader. +1 mp and +2 EI if your opponent has the Balrog in play. +3 EI against Orc characters. +2 EI against Balrog specific characters. +3 to influence checks against Orc factions. +1 Mind and -1 prowess if not at or moving to an Under-deeps site.

card.name: The Balrog
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. +3 to any of his company’s rolls made during step 4 of the movement process. The Balrog’s prowess is modified by -1 instead of -3 when choosing not to tap against a strike. The Balrog may not have followers and his company may not use Region movement. The Balrog’s company is overt. The Balrog’s company is considered to be a Ringwraith company for the purposes of determining automatic-attacks on minion sites. Action: You may reveal this card from your hand to discard any non-character manifestation of the Balrog.

card.name: Bolg
card.text: Unique. Balrog specific. Leader. +1 mp and +2 EI if your opponent has the Balrog in play. +3 EI against Orc characters. +2 EI against Balrog specific characters. +3 to influence checks against Orc factions. +1 Mind and -1 prowess if not at or moving to an Under-deeps site.

card.name: Bûthrakaur
card.text: Unique. Balrog specific. Leader. +2 mp and +3 EI if your opponent has the Balrog in play. +3 EI against Orc and/or Troll characters. +2 EI against Balrog specific characters. +3 to influence checks against Orc factions and Troll factions. +1 Mind and -1 prowess if not at or moving to an Under-deeps site.

card.name: Crook-legged Orc
card.text: Balrog specific. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. You may bring this card from your sideboard to your hand during the organization phase, revealing it to your opponent. You may play this character during the organization phase in addition to another character if you have not already played a character with three mind or less.

card.name: Hill-troll
card.text: Balrog specific. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. You may bring this card from your sideboard to your hand during the organization phase, revealing it to your opponent. You may play this character during the organization phase in addition to another character if you have not already played a character with three mind or less.

card.name: Mountain-maggot
card.text: Balrog specific. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. You may bring this card from your sideboard to your hand during the organization phase, revealing it to your opponent. You may play this character during the organization phase in addition to another character if you have not already played a character with three mind or less.

card.name: Umagaur
card.text: Unique. Balrog specific. Leader. +2 mp and +3 EI if your opponent has the Balrog in play. +3 EI against Orc and/or Troll characters. +2 EI against Balrog specific characters. +3 to influence checks against Orc factions and Troll factions. +1 Mind and -1 prowess if not at or moving to an Under-deeps site.

card.name: Beorning Skin-changers
card.text: Two strikes. May be keyed to Anduin Vales and any of its adacent regions. Detainment against covert companies. Special: If all strikes succeed, the defending company must return to its site of origin.

card.name: Carrion Feeders
card.text: Each wounded character in the company is assigned one strike. On a successful strike, the body check roll is modified by +1. Special: May also be played as a short event; if so, the following applies: Playable on an animal attack. Any body checks resulting from successful strikes are modified by +1. Discard after the attack is faced.

card.name: Olog Warlords
card.text: Three strikes. Detainment against a Ringwraith player’s companies.

card.name: Shelob's Brood
card.text: Four strikes. May be keyed to any Under-deeps site or surface site.

card.name: Black Vapour
card.text: Playable on a Spider attack if a card/action that would cancel it was declared earlier in the same chain of actions. Make a roll and add the attack’s prowess. If the result is greater than 14, the card/action is canceled and the attack receives +1 prowess. Special: This card may be revealed on-guard for this effect.

card.name: Darkness Made by Malice
card.text: Playable on a company at or moving to a R, Under-deeps site, or site with a Spawn automatic-attack if there are more Spawn cards in play than characters in the company. While there are more Spawn cards in play than characters in the company, the company must do nothing during the site phase. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Desire All for Thy Belly
card.text: Unique. Reveal and discard a Spawn card from your hand. Your opponent reveals a number of cards from the top of his play deck equal to the number of Spawn in play. Select one of these cards. Your opponent may either place it in the out-of-play pile or reduce his hand size by one for the rest of the game. Shuffle all remaining cards into the play deck.

card.name: Diminish and Depart
card.text: Playable on an Elf, Hobbit, Wizard, or Fallen Wizard. All Elves and Hobbits in the bearer’s company receive +1 mind, and any Wizard or Fallen Wizard in the company receives -1 EI. Action: Target character may tap during the organization phase if at a H to discard this card.

card.name: Fled into Darkness
card.text: Playable on the Balrog or a Ringwraith when facing a strike. The strike is cancelled and the bearer taps. The bearer may not untap. Trigger: When the bearer would otherwise untap, discard this card instead.

card.name: Glance of Arien
card.text: Environment. Playable on an overt company at or moving to a non-Under-deeps site. All characters in the company receive -2 to prowess and -1 to body. If Gates of Morning is in play, all characters receive an additional -2 to prowess and -1 to body. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Imprisoned and Mocked
card.text: Playable on a non-detainment Orc or Troll automatic-attack or attack keyed to a site. Instead of being used to give a -1 penalty to a defending character’s prowess, excess strikes may modify a strike so that it will take the defending character prisoner at the site if it succeeds. The rescue attack is Trolls — 2 strikes at 10 prowess.

card.name: Monstrosity of Diverse Shape
card.text: Unique. Spawn. The Drowning-Deeps and Remains of Thangorodrim receive an additional automatic-attack: Spawn — 2 strikes at 15 prowess and 9 body. While this card is in play, once per turn the hazard player may use on against the hazard limit to play an Animal or Spider hazard creature from his discard pile.

card.name: Press-gang
card.text: When a character that was in play would otherwise be discarded, discard all cards on him, place him off to the side with this card, and return any character already with this card to its owner’s hand. A character with this card gives his player negative mp. Cannot be duplicated. If this card is discarded, return any character under it to their owner’s hand.

card.name: The Reek
card.text: Playable on a company at or moving to a Ruins & Lairs, Under-deeps site, or site with a Spawn automatic-attack. Tap all untapped characters in the company with a mind less than 1 plus the number of Spawn cards in play.

card.name: Spawn of Ungoliant
card.text: Unique. Spawn. The Pûkel-deeps and Glittering Caves receive an additional automatic-attack: Spawn — 3 strikes at 15 prowess and 8 body. While this card is in play, +1 to all body check rolls for Elves, Dwarves, Hobbits, Dúnedain, and Men resulting from Spider or Animal strikes.

card.name: The Sun Shone Fiercely
card.text: Environment. Any overt company with a b or f in their site path must return to their site of origin unless the contain a Ranger. Additionally, if Gates of Morning is in play, each Minion site with a b or f in its site path is tapped when the card play action of this card resolves. Any such sites revealed while this card is in play are also tapped when they are revealed. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Unabated in Malice
card.text: Playable on an automatic-attack or attack from a Spawn hazard. The attack receives +1 strike, +1 prowess, and -2 body. When the attack would otherwise be canceled, discard this card instead. May not be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Ungoliant's Progeny
card.text: Unique. Spawn. The Wind-deeps and The Rusted-Deeps receive an additional automatic-attack: Spawn — 2 strikes at 16 prowess and 8 body. While this card is in play, before strikes are assigned, the hazard player can choose for each non-unique Spider or Animal attack to be +1 prowess and detainment.

card.name: Ungoliant's Foul Issue
card.text: Unique. Spawn. Ancient Deep-Hold and Deep Mines receive an additional automatic-attack: Spawn — 2 strikes at 17 prowess and 7 body. While this card is in play, non-unique Spider creatures can be keyed to Under-deeps R and S.

card.name: Crept Along Carefully
card.text: Playable on a company during the organization phase. The company cannot use Starter Movement. In addition, if they move with region movement, they are limited in all cases to 3 regions maximum and their hazard limit is reduced by one to a minimum of two during step 7 of the movement process. Action: Discard this card from play during Company vs Company Combat before strikes are assigned to make a roll modified by the number of Rangers in the company. If the result is greater than 7, the combat is canceled.

card.name: Longbottom Leaf
card.text: Take up to two resources from your sideboard to your play deck and reshuffle. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Rumors of Rings
card.text: Startable. Action: If there is no item off to the side with this card, during your organization phase, you may take one Ring Special Item (except for The One Ring) from your sideboard or discard pile and place it off to the side with this card. This item gives no mp. Special: A ring special item placed with this card may be played as though it were in your hand.

card.name: Show Things Unbidden
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on any untapped Galadriel at Lórien. Tap Galadriel. Opponent must reveal to you 3 non-environment hazard cards from his hand and shuffle them into the play deck. If these are not available, opponent must reveal his hand and shuffle all non-environment hazard cards into his play deck.

card.name: To Fealty Sworn
card.text: Playable on a Hobbit in the same company as Return Of The King or playable on a Hobbit during the same site phase his company plays a unique non-Hobbit faction at a F. The Hobbit gains the Warrior skill, +5 EI against characters with Bag End as a home site, and +5 to influence checks against Hobbit factions. Cannot be duplicated on a given Hobbit.

card.name: Elven Rope
card.text: Action: Tap Elven Rope and a Ranger bearer during the organization phase when his company declares region movement. The bearer’s company may move one additional region. Action: When a creature with a normal prowess of less than 11 is defeated by the bearer’s company, you may place the creature off to the side with this card; the creature gives no mp. Special: If a creature is off to the side with this card and it is stored, you gain 3 miscellaneous mp.

card.name: Cave Troll
card.text: May be played at a tapped site. +1 to any rolls made during step 4 of the movement process.

attr.value: Any Under-Deeps site with a Troll Automatic-Attack

card.name: Ancient Secrets
card.text: Playable on an untapped avatar. Tap the avatar. Discard one hazard event played on a character in the avatar’s company or on the company as a whole.

card.name: Going Ever Under Dark
card.text: Playable on a company during the organization phase. The company cannot use starter movement. In addition, if they move with region movement, they are limited in all cases to 3 regions maximum and their hazard limit is reduced by one to a minimum of two during step 7 of the movement process. Action: Discard this card from play during Company vs Company Combat before strikes are assigned to make a roll modified by the number of Scouts in the company. If the result is greater than 7, the combat is canceled.

card.name: Great Army of the North
card.text: All of your influence attempts against Orc and Troll factions are modified by +1. This card is worth 2 mp if you have 4 unique Orc and/or Troll factions in play who do not have a D or H for a home site. Cannot be duplicated as a permanent-event by a given player. Special: This card may be played as a short-event with the following text: Each player may search through their discard pile for any or all orc and/or troll factions and shuffle them into their play deck.

card.name: Grond
card.text: Playable on a unique Orc or Troll faction. -3 prowess to automatic-attacks at F and B in the faction’s current region and in all adjacent regions. May not be duplicated on a given faction.

card.name: Long Grievous Siege
card.text: Playable on a unique non-Dragon faction. Place a B from your location deck off to the side with this card; the B must be in the faction’s current region or an adjacent region. Return any faction with the B as its home site to its owner’s hand if its influence number is less than the target faction’s. All versions of the B gain an additional automatic attack of the same type as the target faction — 5 strikes at 9 prowess.

card.name: No Better Use
card.text: Playable on an untapped character assigned a strike during Company vs Company Combat. Tap the character. Instead of the opposing character making a body check, you may place that character off to the side with this card, discarding all non-character cards that character controls. Trigger: Discard this card if there is no character placed with this card or if its bearer becomes wounded. If so discarded, any character placed off to the side with it forms a company at the same site or a site in the same region. Action: During the site phase at Shelob’s Lair, the bearer may tap to discard this card and eliminate the opponent’s character — you then receive mp as though the character had been eliminated in Company vs Company combat.

card.name: Prone to Violence
card.text: Any overt company can attack any other player’s company and receive kill mp therefrom.

card.name: Sauron
card.text: Playable on The Lidless Eye. All Ringwraith players receive +3 GI. Cannot be duplicated. Action: Discard this card to discard one hazard permanent-event or long-event in play.

card.name: Whispers of Rings
card.text: Startable. Action: If there is no item off to the side with this card, during your organization phase, you may take one Ring Special Item (except for The One Ring) from your sideboard or discard pile and place it off to the side with the card. This item gives no mp. Special: A Ring Special Item placed with this card may be played as though it were in your hand.

card.name: Evil Things Lingering
card.text: Unique. Balrog Specific. Discard this ally if its company declares any movement other than Under-Deeps movement. Action: During the organization phase, make a roll modified by -4. If the result is greater than this ally’s controller’s mind, the controller is eliminated.

card.name: Great Troll
card.text: May only be controlled by The Balrog. You may assign strikes to this ally as though he were unwounded and untapped regardless of his actual status.

card.name: Nasty Slimy Thing
card.text: Unique. Balrog Specific. Discard this ally if its company declares any movement other than Under-Deeps movement. Action: Tap this ally when facing a Drake attack to cancel it.

card.name: A More Evil Hour
card.text: Balrog Specific. Trigger: Tap this card when an opponent plays a card that gives him 3 or more mp. This card does not untap. Action: If tapped, you may discard this card during your organization phase to target a company declaring region movement. The company may move up to two additional regions if moving to a site where an opponent’s company is present.

card.name: Angband Revisited
card.text: Balrog Specific. Untap a character in The Balrog’s company.

card.name: Breach the Hold
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on your untapped Balrog during the site phase as the Drowning-Deeps or The Rusted-Deeps. The Balrog’s company faces 3 attacks: Spawn — 1 strike at 15 prowess Dwarves — 4 strikes at 9 prowess Dwarves — 2 strikes at 12 prowess If the Balrog is not untapped after these attacks, discard this card. Otherwise, place it with the site. The roll required to move to the surface site is reduced to zero. This site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Caverns Unchoked
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the organization phase on an Under-deeps site. This site is never discarded or returned to its location deck. Each S, R, and/or B in the same region as its surface site is considered a surface site of this Under-deeps site.

card.name: Challenge the Power
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on The Balrog if he bears The One Ring. Make a roll modified by +1 for each Sage in the Balrog’s company and each Challenge The Power in play. If the result is: less than 7, the Balrog is eliminated; 7-8, discard this card; 9—10; The One Ring affects the Balrog; 11+ you win the game. Trigger: Discard this card if the Balrog does not bear The One Ring. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Cloaked by Darkness
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on the Balrog’s company if Great Shadow is in play. The hazard limit against the company is reduced by one to no minimum. You may bring this card from your sideboard and shuffle it into your play deck during the organization phase, revealing it to your opponent.

card.name: Crowned with Storm
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable before strikes are assigned on Company vs Company combat if the Balrog is at the site and it is a non-Under-deeps site. Discard all allies with no body at the site.

card.name: Darkness Wielded
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on an attack against the Balrog’s company if Great Shadow is in play Cancel the attack. This card is discarded at the end of the turn. Action: Discard this card to cancel an attack against the Balrog’s company. You may bring this card from your sideboard and shuffle it into your play deck during the organization phase, revealing it to your opponent.

card.name: Descent through Fire
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the site phase on your untapped Balrog at an untapped Under-Galleries or Under-Courts. Tap the site. The Balrog’s company faces 3 attacks: Trolls — 5 strikes at 8 prowess Trolls — 4 strikes at 10 prowess Trolls — 3 strikes at 12 prowess If the Balrog is not untapped after these attacks, discard this card. Otherwise, place it with the site. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. All you characters receive +1 prowess and all your Leaders receive +1 EI. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Eddy in Fate's Tide
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the site phase on an untapped non-Under-Deeps, non-Surface-Site site if your untapped Balrog is there. Tap the Balrog and the site. This site is never discarded and never untaps. Before any company can play any ally or item at any version of this site, it must tap two characters during the site phase.

card.name: Flame of Udûn
card.text: Demon Fána. Playable during the organization phase on your Balrog. Discard the Balrog’s allies. No other character or allies can be in his company unless he is at a H. +1 to all body checks resulting from failed strikes against The Balrog. Action: You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase. Special: Only one Demon Fána card may be in play by a given player at one time.

card.name: Foe Dismayed
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on a Leader or the Balrog facing an attack. All characters in the company gain +1 prowess. Discard after the attack is faced or Playable on a Leader or the Balrog making an influence attempt. +3 to the influence attempt.

card.name: Gangways over the Fire
card.text: Balrog Specific. Startable. During step 10 of the movement process, each of your moving companies may attempt to move with Under-Deeps movement to a new site they have not yet used this turn. During step 4 of the movement process, subtract the number of times the company has used this card this turn from the roll. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Great Fissure
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on an attack keyed to an Under-deeps site or an automatic-attack at an Under-deeps site. The attack is canceled.

card.name: Great Shadow
card.text: Demon Fána. Playable during the organization phase on your Balrog. The Balrog gains the Scout skill and may have followers. The Balrog may not move. Action: During your end-of-turn phase, you may tap the Balrog to take one non-short-event resource or character from your discard pile, reveal it to your opponent, and shuffle it into your play deck. Action: Tap the Balrog to cancel an attack against his company. Action: You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase. Special: Only one Demon Fána card may be in play by a given player at one time.

card.name: Heart of Dark Fire
card.text: Playable on the Balrog if Strangling Coils is in play. You may bring this card from your sideboard and shuffle it into your play deck during the organization phase, revealing it to your opponent. May not be duplicated. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Invade Their Domain
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on your untapped Balrog during the site phase at the surface site of a site with Breach The Hold played on it. The Balrog’s company faces 3 attacks: Dwarves — 5 strikes at 9 prowess Dwarves — 4 strikes at 10 prowess Dwarves — 3 strikes at 12 prowess If the Balrog is not untapped after these attacks, discard this card. Otherwise, place it with the site. This card is discarded if you have no characters at the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Lord and Usurper
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on Invade Their Domain during the site phase if the Balrog is there and untapped. The Balrog’s company faces 2 attacks: Dwarves — 4 strikes at 9 prowess Dwarves — 3 strikes at 10 prowess If the Balrog is not untapped after these attacks, discard this card. Otherwise, place it with Invade Their Domain. All version of the associated site become a S. No Dwarf factions may be played at any version of the site. All versions of the site lose all Dwarf automatic attacks. All versions of the site other than yours gain an automatic-attack of Orcs — 4 strikes at 7 prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given card.

card.name: Maker's Map
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the site phase on an untapped Ranger at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the Ranger and the site. +2 to all rolls made during step 4 of the movement process.

card.name: Memories of Old Torture
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on a non-unique Orc, Troll, Giant, Drake, or Man hazard creature with one strike for each of its attacks before strikes are assigned. All attacks of the creature are canceled. Action: After any attacks from the creature have been faced, a character in the company may tap to make the creature an ally. Place the creature’s card with this card under control of the character. The creature is worth 1 Ally mp and has a prowess equal to its normal prowess minus 7. This card and the associated creature are discarded if its company moves through a f or d.

card.name: Mine or No One's
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on the Balrog if he is making an influence attempt against an opponent’s item, ally, Troll faction, or Orc faction. +10 to the attempt. Cannot be duplicated on a given attempt.

card.name: Obey Him or Die
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the organization phase on a Leader in the Balrog’s company. Bearer cannot be discarded by a body check. Trigger: Discard this card if the bearer’s company contains a character with higher mind. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Orders from the Great Demon
card.text: Balrog Specific. Startable. Playable on a company. This company may contain an additional Balrog-specific leader.

card.name: Out He Sprang
card.text: Balrog Specific. If Great Shadow is not in play, the Balrog may move using region movement to or from a Surface Site. The Balrog may move one region for every 8 mp you have, and this allowance may not be modified by any other resource effect. May not be duplicated.

card.name: People Diminished
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the site phase on an untapped non-Under-deeps, non-Surface-site site that is normally a F or B and that has a non-detainment automatic attack. The company faces 3 attacks of the same type as the first listed automatic attack on the site. 4 strikes at 8 prowess 3 strikes at 10 prowess 2 strikes at 12 prowess If the site and a character in the company are not untapped after these attacks, discard this card. Otherwise, tap the character and the site. All unique factions in play with this home site give -1 mp. This site is never discarded or untapped. -5 to influence attempts against factions by any company at any version of this site.

card.name: Roam the Waste
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the organization phase on Strangling Coils. The Balrog may use region movement to a maximum of one region for each copy of this card in play.

card.name: Roots of the Earth
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on your untapped Balrog during the site phase at an Under-Deeps site that is normally a R. The Balrog’s company faces an attack: Drakes — 2 strikes at 13 prowess. If the Balrog is not untapped after these attacks, discard this card. Otherwise, place it with the site. The site becomes a H and loses all automatic-attacks. All other versions of this site become a S and gain an additional automatic-attack of Orcs — 5 strikes at 9 prowess. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. If Breach The Hold is on the same site, this card gives 2 extra mp.

card.name: Scourge of Fire
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on the Balrog in company vs company combat before his strike is resolved if Flame of Udûn is in play. Choose and discard one item the opposing character bears. You may bring this card from your sideboard and shuffle it into your play deck during your organization phase, revealing it to your opponent.

card.name: Strangling Coils
card.text: Demon Fána. Playable during the organization phase on your Balrog. The Balrog gains the Diplomat skill and may have followers. Action: You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase. Action: Tap the Balrog to untap all other characters in his company. Special: Only one Demon Fána card per player may be in play at any given time.

card.name: Tempest of Fire
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the site phase on an untapped non-Under-Deeps, non-Surface-Site that is normally a B or S and that has a non-detainment automatic-attack. The company faces 3 attacks of the same type as the first listed automatic-attack at the site: 5 strikes at 8 prowess 4 strikes at 9 prowess 3 strikes at 10 prowess If the site and a character in the company are not untapped after these attacks, discard this card. Otherwise, tap the character and the site.

card.name: Terror Heralds Doom
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable during the organization phase if Flame of Udûn is in play. +2 to all influence attempts this turn by any of your companies. Discard at the end of your turn. You may bring this card from your sideboard and shuffle it into your play during the organization phase, revealing it to your opponent.

card.name: Vanguard of Might
card.text: Balrog Specific. Playable on a company at or moving to an Under-deeps site facing an attack before strikes are assigned if you have the Balrog in play. Special Movement: The Balrog joins the company and is assigned one of the strikes. If Flame of Udûn is on the Balrog, resolve company composition during your next organization phase.

card.name: A Few Recruits
card.text: Balrog Specific. This faction’s home site is any non-Under-Deeps, non-Surface-Site, non-hoard R, S, or D. May be played at a tapped site. Standard Modifications: The Balrog +3, Leader +2

card.name: Stabbing Tongue of Fire
card.text: Unique. Playable by the Balrog at any tapped or untapped non-H Under-Deeps site. This item affects the Balrog and may only be borne by him. The bearer receives +1 prowess when tapping to face a strike. +1 to all body check rolls resulting from failed strikes against the bearer.

card.name: Whip of Many Thongs
card.text: Unique. Playable by the Balrog at any tapped or untapped non-H Under-Deeps site. This item affects the Balrog and may only be borne by him. Bearer receives +1 prowess when tapping to face a strike. Action: Before the roll is made when facing a strike in Company vs Company Combat, tap this card to cancel all effects and actions (including those not yet resolved) created by the opposing character’s weapon.

attr.value: One Under-Deeps R, chosen when this card is revealed as a new site (7). Once chosen, this choice cannot be altered.
This site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. Any Spider or Undead creature may be keyed to this site.

Undead — 4 strikes at 7 prowess Undead — 3 strikes at 8 prowess Undead — 2 strikes at 10 prowess Whenever any strike of these attacks succeeds, the defending character must make a corruption check modified by -2.

Successful strikes from the automatic-attacks and rescue attacks at this site do not harm a character; instead, they are taken prisoner. The rescue attack is Maia — 1 strike at 24 prowess. Items do not tap this site when played.
